question: I pee every 10 seconds no joke!?
question_content: I pee like every minute I swear like I'll pee then go back to doing something & boom I'm peeing again .. I just had a uti like a month or two ago & no I'm not pregnant.. I'm not sexually active. but I have a friend whose pregnant & I pee just much as she does if not more idk what's wrong with me? I can't stop peeing or can't go anywhere cos I'm constantly pulling over to use it... should I go to a doctor or ..?

answers.answer_content: It could be a UTI, it could also be the onset of diabetes if it's recent and especially if you also have rapid weight loss and thirst.   The word diabetes means siphon as in urinating like a siphon.   You should probably ask your Doctor

Here&#x27;s a question, does diabetes run in  your family?
Considering the fact that pregnancy as well as a UTI has been ruled out, it will be a good idea to get tested for diabetes, due to the fact that diabetics urinate often as this is one of the common signs of the disease.
It would be that of a wise choice to get tested as soon as possible, as diabetes worsens with no treatment.
Good luck!
These people don't know what they are talking about! Trust me go to a doctor this could be a serious bladder issue, and could cause long term affects.
This is what happens when you have pre-marital sex. you brought it upon yourself.
